title.rendered: SEE THIS IMAGE:  We’ve banned OTHER kinds of WMDs.  Now let’s ban NUCLEAR weapons too.

content.rendered:
People can indeed solve problems!

Do not get discouraged!

In recent decades we have banned SEVERAL KINDS of Weapons of Mass Destruction:

In 1972 the world banned BIOLOGICAL WEAPONS.

In 1993 the world banned CHEMICAL WEAPONS.

In 1997 the world banned LAND MINES.

In 2008 the world banned CLUSTER MUNITIONS.

NOW LET’S BAN NUCLEAR WEAPONS TOO.

Click this link to see the inspiring, persuasive image:

We banned OTHER KINDS of WMD. Now ban NUCLEAR weapons

 

The Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons (TPNW) went into effect on January 22, 2021, for the nations that have ratified it.  Since then, more nations have ratified it.  By the date of its first anniversary of going into effect (January 22, 2022), 50 nations have ratified it.

For more information see the website of the excellent worldwide non-profit organization that has been promoting the Treaty.  Learn a lot from the website of the International Campaign to Abolish Nuclear Weapons (ICAN) at www.icanw.org
